response.overview: Nico, a reclusive, anxiety‑stricken writer, struggles under his overworked sister’s care. As a deadline looms, he retreats into vivid visions of a sunlit meadow—his one refuge slipping reality away. His script unnervingly begins to echo his fractured life, pushing him deeper into madness. Determined, he fights through the turmoil to complete the story. But when he types the final word, the silence that follows is unnerving—like the ending he feared has already arrived.
response.title: Metapora
